text: Naeem Islam (born 19 October 1994) is a Bangladeshi first-class, List A and Twenty20 cricketer since the 2010–11 Bangladeshi cricket season. Naeem is a right-handed batsman and a left-arm orthodox spin bowler. He is currently (July 2016) playing for Chittagong Division. Early in his career, he was playing for the Bangladesh national under-19 cricket team. == References == ==External links== * Category:1994 births Category:Bangladeshi cricketers Category:Chittagong Division cricketers Category:Rajshahi Division cricketers Category:Rangpur Division cricketers Category:Duronto Rajshahi cricketers Category:Khulna Titans cricketers Category:Gazi Tank cricketers Category:Legends of Rupganj cricketers Category:Mohammedan Sporting Club cricketers Category:Abahani Limited cricketers Category:Living people Category:Bangladesh under-19 cricketers Category:Shinepukur Cricket Club cricketers
title: Naeem Islam (cricketer, born 1994)
